name: iTunes responsive
description:
This mainly benefits podcast listings.
  • Names and descriptions are no longer truncated (except where truncated in the underlying markup)
  • The fixed-width layout now adapts to the full screen width
  • The track listing table is as wide as it can be
Example iTunes podcast page: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/inventing-future-chat-mj-broadbent/id970479151
